name: Communist Simulator - CS
description:
You will have a responsible task to revive communism. But on the way you will encounter difficulties in the form of wars and famines. But if you don't give up and accumulate a large army you will make the whole world worship communism.

The game has 4 types of resources: food, army, money, people.

You can improve farms, armies, parks, and raise taxes to citizens.

The glory of communism.

Игра Сделана на тему:

Человечеством правят коммунисты.
